meanings.definition: Sculs (verb): to move swiftly and smoothly
meanings.sent1: The cheetah sculs across the savanna.
meanings.sent2: She sculs through the water effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The ninja sculs past the guards without making a sound.
meanings.sent4: Time sculs forward, never looking back.
meanings.sent5: The dancer sculs gracefully across the stage, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent6: With a gentle breeze, the leaves sculs along the ground.
meanings.sent7: The skater sculs around the rink with ease.
meanings.sent8: The river sculs through the valley, carving its path.
meanings.sent9: The clouds sculs across the sky, painting a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent10: The car sculs smoothly into the parking spot, impressing onlookers.

meanings.definition: Sculs (noun): a quick and smooth movement
meanings.sent1: The sculs of the dancer mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent2: The sculs of the athlete were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The sculs of the squirrel as it leaped from tree to tree were impressive.
meanings.sent4: The sculs of the river over the rocks created a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The sculs of the wind through the leaves created a calming melody.
meanings.sent6: The sculs of the roller coaster brought joy to the riders.
meanings.sent7: The sculs of the train along the tracks echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent8: The sculs of the waves against the shore were a lullaby to the beachgoers.
meanings.sent9: The sculs of the pendulum on the clock marked the passing of time.
meanings.sent10: The sculs of the brush against the canvas created a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Sculs (adjective): quick and smooth in movement
meanings.sent1: The sculs cheetah caught its prey effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: Her sculs movements on the dance floor were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The sculs river flowed gently through the valley.
meanings.sent4: The sculs clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The sculs car glided silently down the road.
meanings.sent6: The sculs cat moved gracefully through the room.
meanings.sent7: The sculs skater performed stunning tricks on the ice.
meanings.sent8: The sculs wind rustled the leaves in the trees.
meanings.sent9: The sculs boat sailed smoothly on the calm waters.
meanings.sent10: The sculs dancer twirled elegantly under the spotlight.
